nodes.text: C-3PO's was a breakfast cereal based on the protocol droid C-3PO.
On one occasion, when his son Luke Skywalker disliked the scrambled eggs with bacon he prepared, the Sith Lord Darth Vader used the Force to serve his son a bowl of C-3PO's.
This is the in-universe version of a real-world cereal that Kellogg's produced in the early 1980s.  A commercial for this cereal aired in 1984.
